Script.name: voteWoTMUD
Script.script: function voteWoTMUD() local last_vote = {} if io.exists(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/last_vote.lua") then table.load(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/last_vote.lua", last_vote) else last_vote.time = getEpoch() table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/last_vote.lua", last_vote) end if getEpoch() - last_vote.time > 86400 then cechoLink( "<red>It has been over 24 hours since you voted!\nClick here or type \"vote WoTMUD\" to vote now.\n", function() local last_vote = {time = getEpoch()} table.save(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/last_vote.lua", last_vote) openUrl("http://www.topmudsites.com/vote-wotmud.html") end, "Click here to vote now.", true ) end end
